products.name: Xiaomi TV A2 32
products.description: The Xiaomi TV A2 32 TV based on Android TV 11 provides instant access to movies and shows for every taste. The built-in Google Assistant completely changes the concept of content management. Thanks to Dolby Audio and DTS Virtual:X Sound, you are guaranteed a cinema-like experience, and frameless design and high HD resolution allow you to fully immerse yourself in viewing.

products.name: SAMSUNG Galaxy S23
products.description: SAMSUNG GALAXY S23 5G S911W 128GB (UNLOCKED) CANADIAN MODEL. SAMASUNG GALAXY S23 5G - SM-S911W (UNLOCKED) BLACK. Don't worry, we're here to help. FULL SAMSUNG WARRANTY INCLUDED. NOT INCLUDED. SIM CARD IS.

reviews.comment: I like the S23. Previously I had S9 and it also was a very good phone. Unfortunately, it started malfunctioning recently so I had to get a new phone. I like the small size - easily fits in my pockets. I specifically decided to get S23 for that reason - one of the few phones left with a small form factor. Battery life seems to be about 3 days when not used frequently. The screen is bright and sharp. Great picture quality even in low light (which has been the hallmark for Samsung with the Galaxy phones). Although I have not taken many pictures yet. I miss not getting a charger and headphones, but unfortunately that has become the standard now. If another company wants to beat Smsung and Apple, one of the advantages could be if they include accesories. Overall excellent phone.
